bibl.title: Demotic Ostraca from Ptolemaic Edfu and the Ptolemaic Tax System.

series.title: Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Vlaamse Kennis- en Cultuurforum

bibl.title: Edfu, an Egyptian Provincial Capital in the Ptolemaic Period. Brussels, 3 September 2001
bibl.author: MUHS, Brian

bibl.note: Discusses the demotic and Greek-demotic ostraca from Ptolemaic Edfu, reexamining their provenance, dating and significance within the Ptolemaic tax system in the light of the other sources concerning Edfu.
MUHS Brian, Demotic Ostraca from Ptolemaic Edfu and the Ptolemaic Tax System.

Katelijn VANDORPE and Willy CLARYSSE (Edd.), Edfu, an Egyptian Provincial Capital in the Ptolemaic Period. Brussels, 3 September 2001 = Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Vlaamse Kennis- en Cultuurforum (Brussel, 2003) pp. 75-105, 10 tabl.
